title: Let's talk
subtitle: Ready for your new CV? Send me a message and secure one of the free places.

form.title: Request application help

fields.name: Name *
fields.situationPlaceholder: Just write freely about where you see problems and I'll help you quickly.
fields.situationHelp: Share what's on your mind - I'm here to help.
fields.helpPlaceholder: What exactly do you need? (e.g. complete CV, design optimization, application tracker, etc.)
fields.privacy: I agree to the processing of my data for handling my request. The data will be treated confidentially and not passed on to third parties. *

form.bookingNote: (Upload your CV if you have one)

response.title: Response time
response.description: I usually respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

duration.question: How long does CV creation take?

free.question: Is the help really free?
free.answer: Yes, completely free for 5 people per month.

documents.question: What documents do you need?
documents.answer: Current data, certificates and your expectations.
